TelemetryDefinition.name: TelemetryDefinition
TelemetryDefinition.description: Represents the definition of the structure of a telemetry signal sent from a connected asset or vehicle.

Description.description: The description of the telemetry definition.

IsTemplate.description: Indicates whether the telemetry definition is a template (true) or not (false).

LatestVersionId.description: The latest version of the telemetry definition. The telemetry definition version with the highest version number is the latest.

UsageType.description: The usage type of the telemetry definition.
